:v-model.description: Bind the value of a checkbox bidirectionally, and if the variable is set to true, it will be selected
:v-model.description_zh: 双向绑定某一个checkbox的值，如果将该变量设置为true，将会被选中

size.description: The size of the component as a whole, in rpx

label-disabled.description: Whether to disable clicking on the text action checkbox
label-disabled.description_zh: 是否禁止点击文本操作checkbox

active-color.description: If you select the color when you set the active-color of CheckboxGroup, it will not work
active-color.description_zh: 选中时的颜色，如设置CheckboxGroup的active-color将失效

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the state of a checkbox changes, the callback is made to an object
events.description_zh: 某个checkbox状态发生变化时触发，回调为一个对象
events.params: detail = {value: [true或者false，true为被选中，否则反之], name: [通过props传递的name参数] }
